body:
Comment 11: 
@shivakumar.gn that is a good suggestion. I can give you access to maintain that page on
the wiki if you would like, however my intention with this issue is just to solve the
problem at hand, the lack of instructions for RHEL/Centos users.

I believe I am speaking for the Go Authors when I say the expected mode of consumption
for Go is as an installer or disto bundled package. That is not too say that they
discourage people from compiling from source, far from it, but I believe they would want
to avoid overwhelming people with details.
